name: Apache HTTP Server basic deployment on a single VM - VMware vSphere
description: This template deploys Apache HTTP Server with a basic configuration on a single Linux node. The installation includes a variable port and content directory. SSL is not configured.

metadata.displayName: Apache HTTP Server basic deployment on a single VM
metadata.longDescription: This template deploys Apache HTTP Server with a basic configuration on a single Linux node. The installation includes a variable port and content directory. SSL is not configured.

bullets.title: Operating Systems Supported
bullets.description:
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6
Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
Ubuntu 14.04 LTS

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining the appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. Detailed system requirements for Apache HTTP Server - http://httpd.apache.org/
